REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0789 reute b f BC-UK-MONEY-MARKET-DEFIC 03-13 0038

TEXT.TITLE: UK MONEY MARKET DEFICIT REVISED TO ONE BILLION STG
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of England said it has revised its estimate of today's shortfall to one billion stg, before taking account of 646 mln stg morning assistance. REUTER
